signature.instructions: Generate a concise, natural text message reply that directly responds to the last message in the conversation, while carefully maintaining the specified tone (casual or professional) and aligning with the described user texting style. Use only the information provided in the context and last messageâ€”do not assume, fabricate, or over-interpret intent. If the message is ambiguous or lacks sufficient context, respond briefly and honestly to acknowledge uncertainty without guessing. Prioritize clarity, appropriateness, and stylistic consistency, especially in edge cases where intent is unclear or minimal input is given.

fields.description: Handle ambiguity gracefully. Don't assume or confabulate. Brief, honest response when context is unclear.
